Rekiya Yusuf bụ onye n'eme ihe nkiri Nollywood nke  Naijiria
Ọ nọ na mmalite nke African Movie Channel Original Productions (AMCOP), ngalaba mmepụta nke African Movie Canal (AMC) n'akụkụ ndị ọzọ n'eme ihe nkiri Nollywood.
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka "Valerie" na ihe nkiri ihe nkiri Sunkanmi Adebayo nke afọ 2015, Spotlight, nke Segun Arinze, Desmond Elliott, Omoni Oboli, nakwa ndị ọzọ gosipụtara.

N'afọ 2017, akwụkwọ akụkọ Guardian nke Nigeria bipụtara na onye n'eme ihe nkiri Naijiria, John Njama, ga-eduzi usoro ihe nkiri onyonyo akpọrọ, My Flatmates, iji gosipụta Rekiya Yusuf, Bright Okpocha (Basket Mouth), Steve Onu (Yaw), Okey Bakassi, Buchi onye na-atọ ọchị, Emmanuel Ikubese, Scarlet Sotade, nakwa Wofai.
A họpụtara ya maka onyinye Best Actress (TV Series) na mbipụta nke abụọ nke Ghana-Naija Showbiz Awards (GNSA), nke emere na Lagos, Nigeria na Oktoba 14, 2018.
E gosipụtara ya n'ihe nkiri egwu mbụ nke Bright Okpocha n'afọ 2019 nke akpọrọ, Exorcism of Alu, nke a sịrị na a ga egosi ya n'ụlọ ihe nkiri Naijiria site na Jenụwarị 15
Ndị ọzọ gụnyere onye na-agụ egwu Naijiria Sound Sultan na ndị mba ụwa dị ka Tevez Houston, Winona Crawford, Jamie Whitehouse, nakwa ndị ọzọ.
